attributes.action: Restrict MP pay rises in line with Public Sector workers.
attributes.additional_details: Time and again, we hear that the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) has awarded MP's a pay rise over and above that awarded to the majority of Private Sector workers, many of whom are working in challenging conditions and/ or risking life and limb. For the sake of fairness, all Government funded employees should be treated the same.
attributes.background: The Government should agree to restrict pay rises to fall in line with whatever other Public Sector workers are awarded.

rejection.details:
